daily_analysis.reasoning: Broader price structure shows higher highs and higher lows from left to right (dominant uptrend). A recent large bullish candle on the right side engulfs prior bearish action near current price, marking a bullish engulfing at a nearby support area (~1.3380–1.3400). This aligns with buy-in-uptrend rules; zone width kept to 20 pips.

m30_analysis.reasoning: A clear bullish engulfing on the M30 (large green candle substantially covers the prior red candle and follows strong upward momentum). The core wick-to-wick area overlapping the Daily zone (1.338–1.340) was narrowed to a 20-pip actionable entry zone (1.3405–1.3385). Coordinates mark the engulfing candle pair area on the chart; zone overlaps the Daily buy zone, supporting the Daily bullish signal.
